channel.title: Pi-for some reason my drops are off?
channel.description: I added chaos ele to my drop list and now none of my drops work I don't think it was that tho please help:)

item.title: Pi-for some reason my drops are off?
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

jessie thompson:

and if that doesnt work?

There’s a possibility that it will work, 50%. Theres also a 50% chance it wont.

If this doesn’t work, then start over again. ;[

item.title: Pi-for some reason my drops are off?
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Anyways, re-extract NPCDrops.cfg and NPCDrops.TSM and see if they work then. Replace the old .cfg and .TSM with the ones you just extracted.

Replace the NPCdrops.TSM the one that you added Chaos ele into, replace it with a new NPCDrops.TSM (Re-extract the .rar file and replace the old .TSM file with the one you extracted).

If you cannot understand that, all I would have to say is, stop coding (In a polite way)

Read full topic

item.title: Pi-for some reason my drops are off?

item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“jessie thompson, post:6, topic:365229”]its the tragety pking source the drops worked yestarday…i deleted the chaos ele and it didnt work… any ideas
btw haste im a girl[/quote]

Sorry, but I highly doubt you’re a girl.

Anyways, re-extract NPCDrops.cfg and NPCDrops.TSM and see if they work then.
Replace the old .cfg and .TSM with the ones you just extracted.
